columns.Workshop_ID: A unique identifier for each workshop, used to distinguish among various workshops.
columns.Date: The date on which the workshop is scheduled to take place.
columns.Venue: The location where the workshop will be held.
columns.Name: The title or designation of the workshop.

workshop.table_description: The workshop table contains records of various workshops, including their identifiers, dates, venues, and names, providing essential information for managing workshop details.

columns.Submission_ID: A unique identifier for each submission, distinguishing one entry from another.
columns.Scores: The numerical evaluation score assigned to the submission, reflecting its quality or merits.
columns.Author: The name of the individual who authored the submission.
columns.College: The name of the academic institution the author is associated with.

submission.table_description: The submission table contains information about papers submitted to a workshop, including unique identifiers, evaluation scores, and details about authors and their affiliated colleges.

columns.Submission_ID: A unique identifier for each submission associated with a workshop.
columns.Workshop_ID: A unique identifier for each workshop to which submissions are made.
columns.Result: Indicates the outcome of the submission, specifying whether it was accepted or rejected.

Acceptance.table_description: The Acceptance table serves to record the results of submissions for various workshops, linking each submission to a specific workshop and detailing its acceptance outcome.
